faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Mahavatar Narsimha.

items.title: What is Mahavatar Narsimha about?
items.description: Mahavatar Narsimha is an animated epic that tells the story of Lord Vishnu's avatars - Varaha and Narsimha. It chronicles the battle against evil demons and the triumph of devotion through Prahlad's unwavering faith.

items.title: Is this film suitable for children?
items.description: Yes, Mahavatar Narsimha is a family-friendly film suitable for all ages. It presents mythological stories with valuable moral lessons about faith, courage, and the victory of good over evil.

items.title: In which languages is the film available?
items.description: The film is available in five languages: Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Malayalam, ensuring audiences across India can enjoy it in their preferred language.

items.title: How long is the movie?
items.description: Mahavatar Narsimha has a runtime of approximately 120 minutes (2 hours), perfectly paced to tell the complete story without rushing the narrative.

items.title: Is this part of a series?
items.description: Yes, Mahavatar Narsimha is the first installment in the planned Mahavatar Cinematic Universe, which will explore all ten avatars of Lord Vishnu.

items.title: Where can I watch the film?
items.description: The film is currently playing in theaters worldwide. Check your local cinema listings for showtimes. Digital streaming options will be announced soon.
